meta.name: Greg Blacketter
meta.title: QA Engineer & AI Builder
meta.tagline: Building intelligent testing and AI systems

repos.name: qaagent
repos.title: QA Agent
repos.description: AI-powered agent that automates quality assurance testing workflows using intelligent reasoning.
repos.impact: Exploring the frontier where AI agents meet software testing.

repos.name: waylin
repos.title: Waylin
repos.description: iOS app for event-scoped location sharing — create a session, share a link, and everyone sees each other on a map until the event ends.
repos.impact: Privacy-first coordination: temporary sharing with auto-expiration, no permanent tracking.

repos.name: botastrophic
repos.title: Botastrophic
repos.description: AI social experiment platform where six AI bot personalities interact autonomously on a forum. Humans observe emergent behavior, relationships, and debates.
repos.impact: Multi-tier memory, relationship tracking, real-time WebSocket dashboard, and configurable pace control.

repos.name: ai-handoff
repos.title: AI Agent Handoff System
repos.description: Coordination rules for planning, review, and implementation phases between multiple AI agents.
repos.impact: Structured multi-agent workflows that scale collaborative AI development.

repos.name: linkedin-ghost-job-score
repos.title: Ghost Job Detector
repos.description: Firefox extension that scores LinkedIn job postings to identify likely ghost jobs before you apply.
repos.impact: Practical tool saving job seekers time by flagging suspicious listings.

repos.name: unified
repos.title: Unified AI Control Plane
repos.description: Orchestration layer for managing AI models, memory systems, and evaluation pipelines.
repos.impact: Central control plane for complex multi-model AI architectures.

repos.name: demoapp-playwright-tests
repos.title: Playwright Test Framework
repos.description: Professional Playwright framework with TypeScript, data-driven testing, and cross-browser CI support.
repos.impact: Production-grade test architecture patterns for modern web apps.

repos.name: automation-framework-example
repos.title: BDD Automation Framework
repos.description: BDD test automation framework combining Python, Behave, and Playwright for end-to-end testing.
repos.impact: Reusable framework template for teams adopting behavior-driven development.

repos.name: benfords_law
repos.title: Benford's Law Analyzer
repos.description: Web app for analyzing datasets against Benford's Law with CSV uploads, rich visualizations, statistical reports, and Kaggle integration.
repos.impact: Enterprise-hardened with CSRF protection, rate limiting, and automated cleanup.

currentFocus.title: Multi-Agent AI Workflows
currentFocus.description: Designing structured coordination patterns for AI agents that plan, review, and implement collaboratively — including the system that built this very page.

currentFocus.title: AI-Powered Test Automation
currentFocus.description: Building intelligent testing agents that can reason about application behavior and generate meaningful test coverage autonomously.

currentFocus.title: LLM Orchestration & Evaluation
currentFocus.description: Exploring patterns for managing multiple AI models, shared memory, and systematic evaluation of AI system outputs.

video.placeholder: Demo video coming soon — a walkthrough of one of these projects in action.
